summary: THE AIRBAGS ON THIS VEHICLE HAVE BEEN RECALLED.  WHEN CONTACTING THE FORD DEALER THEY SAID THAT THE COMPANY MAKING THE AIRBAGS HAS GONE BANKRUPT AND THERE IS NOT A REPLACEMENT AIRBAG FOR THE DEFECTIVE ONE IN THE VEHICLE.  IF THE AIRBAG DEPLOYS IN AN ACCIDENT, IT COULD SERIOUSLY HURT OR KILL A PASSENGER.  I AM AFRAID TO DRIVE THE CAR THE WAY IT IS AND FORD DOES NOT KNOW WHEN THIS RECALLED NEW PART WILL BE COME AVAILALBE.
